info.title: Interbook 3.0
info.description: Interbook is the hotel central reservation system, it is used mostly in the hotel and resort industry. Interbook. InterMiles are building a booking engine for Hotels / Stay Properties fetched from two suppliers (Hotel Beds and Expedia). This will allow customers an easy access for various properties and their prices in a single page. This will also facilitate InterMiles members to earn InterMiles as rewards on their transaction done through this application at the registered supplier. This document briefs about all the application program interface used to power the Interbook application in any platform.

post.description: This API will be used to fetch all the hotel recommendations on the homepage. This can be done using the hotel IDs. The request parameters and the response would be described more in the coming section.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.value: The InterMiles membership number can be passed here for all the login cases

requestBody.description:
Following should be sent in the request for this service: - 
"login":true/ false (This is a Boolean and can be passed either true or false)
"tier":"red", (If login is false, then tier should not be passed. If login is true, then tier shall be passed in the service request.)
"hotelIDs":[] (Hotel IDs should be passed only if the user wants to display the hotel recommendations based out of a specific hotel ID or hotel IDs)
"type":"accrual" (Type should be passed in each request whether it is accrual or redemption. For accrual transactions, type should be passed as "accrual" and for redemption transactions, type should be passed as "redeem")

200.description:
• All the recommendations available/ configured in the interbook backend panel should be fetched and displayed in the response as per the request.
  • If user passes the hotel ID in the request, the recommendations should be fetched from the supplier as per the hotel IDs
  • Recommendations can fetch up to 12 hotels which can be displayed in the list (on homepage)
  • Hotel details like hotel image, star rating, customer rating, price details of the hotel, hotel name and address etc.
  • the city destination as well as hotel destination ID should be available in the response so that user can navigate to hotel details page from the recommendation section

post.description: This API can be used to fetch the destination/ property results as the autosuggest whenever the user enters any key. I.e., if user enters DEL as the key, the destinations and properties matching with the key will be fetched as the response.

requestBody.description:
• Only 1 parameter should be passed in the request. i.e., key
  • User can enter the desired key in the request for e.g., user enters DEL as the key in the request, then the results (character matching destination and properties) should be fetched and displayed in the response.
  • Minimum character to be passed in the request is 1 and maximum character that can be passed in the request is 50.
  • If the key is passed as blank in the request, top destinations should be fetched and rendered in the response

200.description:
The following details would be displayed in the response: -
  • Status would be true only if data is available in the response.
  • For all the other response, status would be false
  • Data would be fetched as per the key passed in the request. City or region or property matching with the character passed in the request would be fetched and displayed.
  • Following data would be fetched and displayed (if data is available): - Destination ID, type, name, country, property count and property type
  • Destination ID, type and name would be displayed for each response. country and property count would be displayed only if the type of search is city or region. Property type will be there only for the type property.
  • Default 5 top destination details would be displayed on the response if nothing is passed in the request (key parameter)"

children.name: destination_id
children.description: The respective detination ID, i.e., City ID or Property ID will be displayed over here as per the type of suggestion whether it is a city or property. If type is city, then consider destination ID as city ID and if the type is property, then consider the destination ID as property ID

children.name: type
children.description: Describes whether the suggestion is a property or a city or a region etc.

children.name: name
children.description: Name of the city or property

children.name: property_count
children.description: Total no. of properties available in a city or region will be displayed. this field will be blank if the type is property

children.name: propertytype
children.description: This field displays value only if the type is property. It describes property type whether the property is a Villa or Apartment etc.

get.description: Get Homepage Banners. All the homepage main banner images and the corresponding title description would be fetched and displayed by this API.

parameters.name: member_number
parameters.description: InterMiles Membership number of the logged in user. This will be mandatory for fetching the apartments & more details. This can be passed as "member_number=0" if user is fetching the details for non-l

200.description:
Following details should be fetched in the response: -
Fetches the banner images and banner texts to be displayed on the application.
HTML and without HTML banner texts would be displayed in the response. Users can use mainly banner texts without HTML for the actual banner text to be used in the application.
Mobile and web banner details are getting fetched separately in the response.

post.description: Hotel Search API. This API would be used to fetch the hotel results based on the different search criteria like destination/ property, check-in date, check-out date, no. of adults, no. of children, no. of rooms, etc. Hotel details should be fetched and displayed on the response based out of the search criteria.

requestBody.description:
This API would be used to fetch the hotel results based on the different search criteria like destination/ property, check-in date, check-out date, no. of adults, no. of children, no. of rooms, etc.
  • The format for check in and checkout date would be yyyy-mm-dd
  • If search is coming from the flights platform, then source should be passed as "92b148f345d534cb4eb1fb0b5a4870b7" and the type must be passed as "cross_cell". This will be used for cross sell search requests.
  • For any change in the destination, we should change the destination ID as destination ID is the unique parameter here. Region and country is for display purpose in the page

200.description: Hotel details should be fetched and displayed on the response based out of the search criteria passed in the request.

post.description:
Hotel Details API - This API is used to fetch the hotel details for a specific hotel. This API can be used when user is navigating to the hotel details page from any of the pages. Following would be some of the scenarios where hotel details API can be used: -
  • Clicking on any of the hotels from the hotel search results page. i.e., passing any of the details from Search API
  • Clicking on any of the hotels from Hotel recommendations
  • Clicking on any of the hotels from Hotel Special Deals
    • etc.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.value: The InterMiles membership number can be passed here for all the login cases

post.description: Hotel Booking API - This API would be used to do the create booking and create a reference number on the inter Miles back end and save all the details.

IBH_NO.name: IBH_NO
IBH_NO.description: The booking reference of the interbook platform which can be used further for the payment gateway as well as fetching the booking details

post.description: Book A Hotel API - This API would be used to create the actual booking at the supplier side post the payment collection on accrual flow. On Redemption flow, this API would be called post the redemption success at the CRIS side.

Booking details API - This API would be called on the confirmation page of the interbook platform where all the hotel details, as well as the booking details as well as the traveler details of the booked hotel, would be displayed along with the status of the respective booking.
View Cancellation Refund API - This API would be used to fetch the refund info of the respective booking which can be displayed in the front end as the confirm cancellation details page.
Booking Cancel API - v2/bookingcancel - This API is used for the online cancellation of the supplier booking.
Modify Booking Request API - This API would be used to send modify booking requests email to the Intermiles backend admins.
Resend Email SMS API - This API would be used to resend the Email and SMS from the manage booking page using the booking reference number.

post.description: My Bookings API (/v2/mybookings) - This API fetches all the bookings like upcoming, completed, and canceled hotel bookings based on the respective member number.

get.description: Safety Measures API - This API would be fetching the details which need to be displayed under the safety measures followed section on the hotel details page. The icon, title and the description for each of the tiles in the safety measures should be fetched here.

int_id.description: The Order ID in which the data to be displayed in the frontend

int_web_title.description: Title for the specific safety measure

data.int_web_details: Deep cleaning premises and restaurants, enhanced cleaning protocols, hygiene and infection control practices
Prior history of travel and symptoms, thermal scanning, contactless check-in, interaction and payments etc
Daily Temperature checks, usage of masks, special training, PPE & equipment
Reduced seating, F&B service modification, technological advancements, innovations etc

post.description: Create Booking API v3 - Redemption booking has been decoupled in this API and the price in cash or miles has been added in the response. For redemption booking, this API will just create the order iD at the interbook backend and provide the response. the calling application will use the interbook reference number/ order ID and call the razorpay/ CRIS redemption according to the accrual/ redemption flow respectively. 1 more parameter added in the resposne named config_id which will be available if cobrand coupon is applied on the create booking.
Book a Hotel API v3 - This API of version 3 serves the supplier booking independently for both the accrual and redemption flows.
Send Email SMS v2 - this is just a copy of send email SMS API with version 2 implemented in it. This will perform the resend email and SMS functionality.

Search API - This would be used to search the hotels based on the defined search criteria in the request like check in date, checkout date, destination ID, number of PAX configurations etc. The response would be having the different set of hotels/ resorts for the specific search criteria.

requestBody.description:
Following parameters should be passed in the body: -
  • destination_id - destination ID is basically the unique location ID available with us. The consumer can get this location ID from locations API where each of the location type item will have a unique destination ID. for e.g. Mumbai is the location the consumer wants to search, then consumer can pass 100030 as the destination ID
  • search type - Search type can be passed as a number in the request. This number decides which type should be searched and fetched in the response. The legends for the same is as follows: -
    • "province_state": 3
    • "multi_city_vicinity": 4
    • "high_level_region": 5
    • "city": 6
    • "neighborhood": 7
    • "airport": 8
    • "point_of_interest": 9
    • "train_station": 10
    • "metro_station": 11
    • "property":21
  • nationality - The format of the nationality in the request would be in 2 camel case characters. For e.g. if Indian is the nationality, then IN should be passed in the request. This should be as per the universal standard.
  • currency - Currency in which the prices for the hotels under the specified destination should be fetched and displayed in the response. Currency can be passed in 3 characters. For e.g. if the consumer wants to fetch the results in US dollars, then the currency should be passed as USD. If the consumer wants the resulrs in indian rupee, then the currency should be passed as INR.
  • check_in_date - From date or check in date. Date format for the check_in date should be "yyyy-mm-dd"
  • check_out_date - To date or check out date. Date format for the check_in date should be "yyyy-mm-dd"
  • hotel_id - In the search API, either destination ID or hotel ID will be mandatory. Hotel ID will be an array where consumer can pass the desired hotel IDs for hotel search [Format will be number. Hotel IDs can be passed inside an array in comma separated way.]
  • rooms
    • adult count
    • children - child where age of each child to be passed as an object
  • result_all - This is a boolean value and can be passed as either true or false. If it is passed as true, then all the hotels as per the search criteria would be fetched and displayed in the response.
  • limit - Format of this field is a number. Consumer can pass the desired number to limit the search results for e.g. 1000
    • Note: Either of destination ID or hotel ID is mandatory for this search API request. If consumer pass both the destination ID and hotel ID, then the priority will be given to destination ID search. For destination ID search, search type should be passed from 3 to 11. For hotel ID search, search type should be always passed as 21. Hotel search request can of 2 types. One would be asynchronous request and other would be a synchronous request. to be specific, One request can fetch all the hotel results in 1 go [which will be little time consuming than the second approach]. Here, the response would have all the hotel results in the response. The second method will be a 2 step process. here Limit can be passed in the hotel search request. let's say 100, 150, etc. Here, only the limit amount of results would be fetched in 1st go. Then the user can again call the search request by passing the unique ID in the header to fetch all the results for the same criteria.

200.description:
Hotel search API response would have the following main information: -
  • Total property counts
  • Search ID
  • Unique ID for each hotel in the search API response
  • hotel details
    • name, address, rating, customer rating etc.
    • Cheapest room details for the specific hotel
    • Price details
    • Hotel image details
      • etc.
